overview: In love with her high powered boss, the housekeeper manages to hide her true feelings. But when his fiance bails on him, he invites the maid to a swanky function as her replacement. Soon she replaces the fiance in the bedroom as well. When the fiance returns, the housekeeper takes a hike. But how far must she go to win him back?
tagline: The One That Got Away And The One He Never Say Coming...
title: Without You
